content:
# The iron ore has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which is now working with 9 iron ore remaining.
# 
# The furnace has produced a total of 13 iron plates so far and is actively processing the new input. 
# 
# Since I still have 10 coal in my inventory, the furnace should continue smelting without any issues for a while. 
# 
# I will keep an eye on the furnace's status and wait for it to finish smelting the remaining iron ore.

sleep(10)  # Wait for 10 seconds to allow the furnace to continue smelting.

# After waiting, I will check the status of the furnace and my inventory again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
